Crimes.Crime_Name: Misrepresentation under Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether the marriage was genuine or primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal against refusal of spousal sponsorship
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility findings due to inconsistent testimonies and failure to testify
Crimes.Legal_Provision: Section 40 of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act (misrepresentation)
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Inconsistencies in testimony and lack of corroborative evidence
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Administrative appeal followed by judicial review
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Burden of proof on applicant to show genuine marriage
Crimes.Application_Factor: Prior immigration issues and procedural history
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of credible documentation and communication records
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure of Mr. Doherty to testify

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to Comply with Visa Requirements
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Genuineness of marriage for immigration purposes
Crimes.Application_Facts: Inconsistent accounts, lack of communication evidence, prior immigration problems
Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Failed to meet evidentiary burden for genuine relationship
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Marriage not genuine, entered primarily for immigration benefit
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Balance of probabilities; reasonableness on review
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure to testify and produce evidence
Crimes.Governing_Rule: IRPA rules on family class sponsorship
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of photos, joint financial records, communication history
Crimes.Harm_Assessment: No harm established due to non-genuine claim
Crimes.Cause_Description: Doubt over authenticity of marital relationship
Crimes.Evidence_Issues: Insufficient proof of cohabitation and emotional bond
Crimes.Misrepresentation_Element: Implied through false claims of relationship
Crimes.Legal_Provision: IRPA sections related to sponsorship eligibility
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Failure to meet burden of proof

Crimes.Legal_Issue: Whether marriage was genuine or for immigration advantage
Crimes.Procedural_Context: Appeal following refusal of sponsorship based on fraud suspicion
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Serious doubts due to inconsistent behavior and testimony
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Withdrawal and reinstatement of sponsorship, failure to testify
Crimes.Application_Error: Failure to prove genuine marital relationship
Crimes.Legal_Standard: Applicant bears burden to prove genuineness
Crimes.Application_Factor: Pattern of behavior suggesting fraudulent intent
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Marriage found to be primarily for immigration purposes
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Lack of independent evidence supporting cohabitation or shared life
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Failure of sponsor’s spouse to appear and testify
